1. SOS

In an Emergency:

• Open the EquiSave app.
• Tap the SOS button on the home screen.
• Your location will be sent to emergency contacts and local authorities.
• The app will also activate a loud alarm to attract attention.

2. Live Location Tracking

To Share Your Location:

• Go to the Live Location Tracking feature from the main menu.
• Tap Start Tracking to share your live location with selected contacts.
• You can stop sharing your location by tapping Stop Tracking.

3. Find Nearby Police Stations

To Locate Police Stations:

• Open the Find Nearby Police Stations feature.
• The app will use your current location to display a list of nearby police stations.
• Tap on any police station to view its details and get directions.

4. Trusted Contacts

To Add Trusted Contacts:

• Navigate to the Trusted Contacts section.
• Tap Add Contact and enter the contact's details.
• You can add phone numbers and email addresses.
• Save the contact, and they will be alerted in case of emergencies.

5. Support

For Assistance:

• Access the Support section from the main menu.
• Browse through various support options like Police, Mental, Medical, and Legal Support.
• Tap on any section to get more details and access resources.

6. Tips and Tricks

For Safety Tips:

• Go to the Tips and Tricks section.
• Read through practical safety advice and emergency preparedness tips.
• You can also view images and guidelines for quick reference.

7. Shop

To Purchase Safety Products:

• Open the Shop feature from the main menu.
• Browse through available safety products like alarms, self-defense tools, and personal safety apps.
• Tap on any product to view details and make a purchase.

Additional Information

• Notifications: Ensure that notifications are enabled to receive alerts and updates.
• Permissions: Grant necessary permissions for location access and contacts to fully utilize the app’s features.
• Support: For any app-related issues, visit the Support section or contact our support team through the app.
• Stay safe with EquiSave!
